biotools.summary: BIoMap is a powerful image processing and display software that now supports a wide range of imaging techniques such as MRI, optical imaging, PET, CT, NIRF and MSI. It provides a unified visualization and storage platform and supports the reconstruction of multidimensional data and the display of ROIs.
